effects: Physical damage (10x, ATK) to one enemy (ignore cover)
Reduce resistance to all elements by 30% for 3 turns to one enemy
Reduce damage received by 50% to caster for 2 turns
name: Prishe Special
Prishe Special
普利修特技
Especial de Prishe
desc_short: Deal partial unmitigated damage and reduce fire, ice, lightning, water, wind, earth, light, and dark resistance for one enemy and reduce damage taken by self for two turns
對1名敵人發動無視部分防禦的攻擊+降低火冰雷水風土光暗屬性耐性的數值+2回合內減少對自身的傷害
Daño absoluto parcial y reduce la res. al fuego, hielo, rayo, agua, viento, tierra, luz y oscuridad de un enemigo, reduce el daño que recibe el usuario durante 2 turnos
